directions: In a small bowl, mix in protein powder.
melt the peanut butter and add it in with the protein powder.

next stir in some milk. you can add that amount in little by little to get the texture you want. you can add more milk than the ingredients call for to get the perfect texture because it depends on your protein powder.
then add in your chocolate preference.
freeze for 20-30 min. and then serve.
ingredients: you can choose whichever chocolate you have on hand
2 tsp of chocolate powder (Hershey, Nesquik, Ovaltine)
title: Clean Eating Cookie Dough Recipe
